question: The group reagent <katex>$NH_{4}Cl(s)$</katex> and aqueous <katex>$NH_{3}$</katex> will precipitate which of the following ion?
explanation: This reagent combination is used for Group III cations.
It precipitates <katex>$Al^{3+}$</katex>, <katex>$Fe^{3+}$</katex>, and <katex>$Cr^{3+}$</katex> as their hydroxides.
